text: {{Infobox settlement | name = The Mid-State | official_name = Nashville-Davidson-Mufreesboro-Franklin, TN MSA | settlement_type = Metropolitan area | image_skyline = Nashville skyline from Fort Negley 2018.jpg | imagesize = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_map = Nashville Metro counties in Tennessee highlighted.svg | mapsize = 250 | map_caption = Nashville-Davidson-Mufreesboro-Franklin Metropolitan Statistical Area | pushpin_map = | pushpin_map_caption = | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = United States | subdivision_type1 = State | subdivision_type2 = Largest city | subdivision_type3 = Principal cities | subdivision_name1 = Tennessee | subdivision_name2 = Nashville | subdivision_name3 = \- Murfreesboro \- Franklin | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | seat_type = | seat = | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = | leader_name = | unit_pref = US | area_footnotes = | area_total_sq_mi = 7484 | area_land_sq_mi = | area_water_sq_mi = | area_water_percent = | area_note = | elevation_max_footnotes = | elevation_max_ft = Short Mountain 2,092 | elevation_max_m = 638 | elevation_min_footnotes = | elevation_min_ft = | elevation_min_m = | population_total = 2,014,444 (35th) | population_as_of = 2020 | population_footnotes = | population_density_sq_mi = 258 | population_demonym = | timezone1 = Central Time Zone (CST) | utc_offset1 = −6 | timezone1_DST = CDT | utc_offset1_DST = −5 | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code = 615, 629 | area_code_type = | iso_code = | website = | footnotes = }} The Nashville metropolitan area (officially, the Nashville-Davidson–Murfreesboro–Franklin, TN Metropolitan Statistical Area) is a metropolitan statistical area centered around Nashville, Tennessee, the capital and largest city in Tennessee, in the United States. With a population around 2 million, it is the most populous metropolitan area in Tennessee. It is also the largest metropolitan area in Tennessee, in terms of land area. Category:Nashville, Tennessee Category:Metropolitan areas of the United States
